name: v0.2.1
body:
## `WORKSPACE` code
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cuda",
    sha256 = "2f8c8c8c85f727bec4423efecec12d3b751cb0a98bda99f0f9d351608a23b858",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cuda-v0.2.1",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/releases/download/v0.2.1/rules_cuda-v0.2.1.tar.gz"],
)

load("@rules_cuda//cuda:repositories.bzl", "register_detected_cuda_toolchains", "rules_cuda_dependencies")
rules_cuda_dependencies()
register_detected_cuda_toolchains()
```

## What's Changed
* Fix url for BCR publish app by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/165
* Add cuda_test rule by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/168
* chore(deps): update nccl digest to 4365458 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/171
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.4.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/173
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/174
* chore(deps): update nccl-tests digest to 6c46206 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/172
* Fix cuda test duplicate deps attribute by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/176
* Improve RDC by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/167

## New Contributors
* @hofbi made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/168

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1

name: v0.1.2
body:
## `WORKSPACE` code
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cuda",
    sha256 = "dc1f4f704ca56e3d5edd973f98a45f0487d0f28c689d0a57ba236112148b1833",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cuda-v0.1.2",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/releases/download/v0.1.2/rules_cuda-v0.1.2.tar.gz"],
)

load("@rules_cuda//cuda:repositories.bzl", "register_detected_cuda_toolchains", "rules_cuda_dependencies")
rules_cuda_dependencies()
register_detected_cuda_toolchains()
```

## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update actions/upload-artifact action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/58
* Fix typos and grammar in README.md by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/61
* Add option to add files to the toolchain configuration by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/59
* Initial bzlmod support by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/36
* Allow inl as header suffix. by @liuliu in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/62
* Add publish-to-bcr configuration by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/64

## New Contributors
* @liuliu made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/62

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/compare/v0.1.1...v0.1.2

name: v0.1.1
body:
This release adds a new build artifact, `rules_cuda-vx.y.z.tar.gz`, for all future releases. This artifact is to be used by `http_archive`
repository rules. This also fixes the sha256 sum included in the sample `WORKSPACE` code.


## `WORKSPACE` code
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cuda",
    sha256 = "b2750e65a2c0f34be643146b3975ded79b8c6edc47b529a5b774418139694032",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cuda-v0.1.1",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/releases/download/v0.1.1/rules_cuda-v0.1.1.tar.gz"],
)

load("@rules_cuda//cuda:repositories.bzl", "register_detected_cuda_toolchains", "rules_cuda_dependencies")
rules_cuda_dependencies()
register_detected_cuda_toolchains()
```

## What's Changed
* fix: generate release .tgz and correct checksum by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/57


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/commits/v0.1.1

name: v0.1.0
body:
#rules_cuda Initial Release (v0.1.0)

This release adds support for builds using your local CUDA toolchain. It includes support for both `cuda_library` and `cuda_objects` rules (see `README.md` for more details). 

Please try the examples, migrate your builds to use these rules, and provide feedback!

## `WORKSPACE` code
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cuda",
    sha256 = "c03654f2bb3d4b8573c99f0203e8e5f48a1db94c9a1719f04993dcb90b57bc7b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cuda-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/archive/refs/tags/v0.1.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_bazel setup  #
######################
# Fetches the rules_bazel dependencies and initializes the cuda toolchain.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.

load("@rules_cuda//cuda:repositories.bzl", "register_detected_cuda_toolchains", "rules_cuda_dependencies")
rules_cuda_dependencies()
register_detected_cuda_toolchains()

```


## What's Changed
* eliminate cpu architecture constraint for nvcc by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/8
* add support for some cudax libraries by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/9
* add defensive wiring for header-only libraries by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/11
* Fix typo by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/10
* add agx orin & hopper compute capabilities by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/12
* Add basic CI for utilities by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/13
* Add CI for building by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/14
* Add docs for various rule and macros by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/17
* Merge dlink_wrapper.bzl into dlink.bzl by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/18
* Add internal docstring by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/19
* Add bazelignore file by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/22
* Disable arch_native by default by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/21
* Silence deprecation warning by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/23
* chore: add pre-commit for buildifier/prettier by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/24
* Add CODEOWNERS file by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/28
* Enable tests on pull requests by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/27
* refactor!: make structure consistent w/ rule guidelines by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/25
* Use an older node version in pre-commit for compatibility with older â€¦ by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/29
* Move if_linux and if_windows into rules_cuda by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/30
* Build fix by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/33
* Fix flag_alias by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/34
* Set local and configure on local_cuda repository by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/37
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_stardoc to v0.5.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/41
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v5.3.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/42
* Make examples its own workspace by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/44
* ci: create release automation by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/46
* Setup CI pipeline for testing docs generation by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/49
* Add features for relaxed-constexpr and extended-lambda by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/48
* Make CI eco-friendly by avoiding run pipelines twice on push within PR by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/50
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v5.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/52
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/53
* Enable rules_cuda by default, add docs by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/54

## New Contributors
* @cloudhan made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/13
* @jsharpe made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/22
* @renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/41

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/commits/v0.1.0
